ygData.subject: Hey Prowler
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hey Prowler. I was woundering when you would get here. Its been awile since we met, on Cybertron. OOC: Brad, we didn t work out how they new each other,

::Hot Rod::

"Hey Prowler. I was woundering when you would get here. Its been awile
since we met, on Cybertron."

OOC: Brad, we didn't work out how they new each other, so lets say they
met on Cybertron, when Hot Rod returned from his exploration mission.
